title: Campagnolo Super Record HPPM Delivers Spider-Based Power Meter Accurate to +/- 1%
content:
Sixteen strain gauges, one gyroscope, a titanium axle and hollow carbon cranks combine to give a lightweight power meter crankset from Campagnolo with class-leading accuracy

Read the full article at Campagnolo Super Record HPPM Delivers Spider-Based Power Meter Accurate to +/- 1% on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
